YourAverageBoOrb.NAME: Your Average Bo
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of turn, deal #b
damage to the frontmost enemy. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b
damage to the frontmost enemy twice.

GomiOrb.NAME: Gomi
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of turn, apply #b
#yPoison to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Apply #b

MinikoMewOrb.NAME: MinikoMew
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of turn, make a random card in your draw or discard pile
cost no [E] on next use. NL #yEvoke: Make a random
card in hand cost no [E] for next use.
